overview:
Oliver Guinan is a 15 year veteran of the internet industry from Tullamore, Ireland. After starting his career in the internet mapping industry, Oliver has developed, deployed and supported some of the largest consumer internet applications in the world. This included a number of years at Yahoo! in their Media Group which includes the world leading news, finance and sports websites.

Oliver has worked at several startup companies that were focused on simplifying the process of turning large quantities of data into manageable information.

Oliver holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Trinity College Dublin, Ireland.
